content.html: I can't tell you how many requests I've heard that aren't technically requests by detained people. ❌ "Shouldn't I speak to a lawyer?" ❌ "I should talk to a lawyer about this." ❌ "Don't I get a lawyer?" Say: "I request to speak to my court-appointed attorney," and then STFU.
content.value:
I can't tell you how many requests I've heard that aren't technically requests by detained people.

❌ "Shouldn't I speak to a lawyer?"
❌ "I should talk to a lawyer about this."
❌ "Don't I get a lawyer?"

Say: "I request to speak to my court-appointed attorney," and then STFU.
